Package uk.ac.aber.cs21120.interfaces

Class IGrid.BadDigitException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • uk.ac.aber.cs21120.interfaces.IGrid.BadDigitException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing interface:
    IGrid
    public static class IGrid.BadDigitException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    You should throw this exception when you try to set() an invalid digit. Only the values 0-9 are acceptable (0 for empty, 1-9 for actual values).
    See Also:
